message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Alice, let's make a deal. I'll take a bit more, but we'll both walk away with something. Time is money, after all!
Bob, I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to make sure I get a fair share too. Let's find a middle ground.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  Let's settle this now with a slight adjustment to your previous offer.
